page.title: 19KEMBLE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The{Village Hall}was built in 1899. There is a Village Hall Committee who make sure that everything is kept in good condition. A lot of clubs go there like the Dance Club and the Cubs and the Playgroup. The School uses it for gym, P.E. and Drama. Grown-ups use it for discos and parties, concerts and dances. The Village Hall has been decorated and toilets and a new kitchen have been put in. A car park has been built behind the Village Hall. Most of the work was done by the people in the village with the help of a grant from the{Gloucestershire Community Council.
